DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_13_01: Who would have thought that some new kid who just showed up at the Haven would make it to the very finals of the tournament.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_13_02: It'll be sad to watch Ben rip your guts right in the middle of the arena.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Suprise_15_01: I hope you won't be surprised.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Suprise_13_01: I've seen too many who thought they were the ones to break Ben's streak.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Suprise_13_03: Well, it was nice knowing you.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Advice_15_01: I don't want to see it myself. Any advices?
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Advice_13_01: I've had a chance to watch Ben in action a few times now. The guy is tough as a rock, and he's punching in the face even harder.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Advice_13_02: The most important thing is to keep him at a distance and let him swing his weapon.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Advice_13_03: Ben doesn't fight with much finesse, once you understand his fighting style it's enough to strike when he is the most exposed.
DIA_Alvarez_BeforeFinal_Advice_13_07: Well, it was nice knowing you.
DIA_Alvarez_TournamentFight_13_02: I never would have thought judging by those thin arms.
DIA_Alvarez_TournamentFight_13_03: Looking at your think shoulders, the audience probably won't even have time to warm up.
DIA_Alvarez_TournamentFight_13_04: Okay, let's get this over with.
DIA_Alvarez_AfterTournamentFight_13_02: Thanks to you, I'm even closer to winning.
DIA_Alvarez_AfterTournamentFight_13_04: You are indeed a tough bastard...
DIA_Alvarez_AfterTournamentFight_13_05: To lose a fight with youngster like that...
